      • testOOMEMD5Sum

        public void testOOMEMD5Sum()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Note that this test creates a large 100MB file in /tmp and then does an md5sum on the file. With a previous implementation of MD5Sum.getFileMD5Sum() this would cause an OOME with a max-heap size in junit of 256m. This is configured in: spacewalk/buildconf/build-utils.xml: The new implementation uses less memory and thus passes the test below when ran from Junit CLI.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
